Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Carla Jolly
Reviews.Content: Works Great!!! Worth every penny I spent on it! Bought it for my little girl and I belive she will will be very excited Christmas morning :)

Reviews.Title: Granddaughter's Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: J. Kratzer
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter is 8 years old and loves this netbook.  She calls it her laptop and uses it for math tutoring and reading and games.  The camera only takes selfies, but she is in to that so she is having fun with it.

Reviews.Title: IT SUCKS
Reviews.Author: mays alzihery
Reviews.Content: This thing does not work. My baby girl used it once before it started to freez and not turn on. The screen sucks, you can't view or do anything with it.

Reviews.Title: Not for everyone.
Reviews.Author: libbyd
Reviews.Content: This a good product. I would only recommend it to kids that just started to learn a laptop or a tablet.

Reviews.Title: dont like this "laptop"
Reviews.Author: Kendra
Reviews.Content: it doesn't have any games in the google play store ti reads that it is compatible with, its very very slow, and does not work like a computer at all. not happy with this product at all

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Michelle Bridges
Reviews.Content: My rating is 4 because the netbook is great. I originally thought I was ordering a tablet with a keyboard, but I received a netbook. Net book is better with more features.

Reviews.Title: Good for kids.
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old who was obsessed with my laptop. It is great for her for some kids games and online but that's about it. It would be a lot better if the screen was touch screen. The one problem we do have is a lot of the games you download from google play is stuck in tablet mode and will only show the game on the screen sideways.

Reviews.Title: laptop had virus
Reviews.Author: Shanna
Reviews.Content: Laptop had virus. It was for my daughter. ...The next day it was moving slow. ..wouldn't allow us to getOn the Internet.  The posting also said it was a tablet & a laptop. ...it's only laptop.  False advertising

Reviews.Title: nice for the price!
Reviews.Author: Pepper power
Reviews.Content: This is a great Android device for a great price..  I did have a little problem with the mouse but it was easily resolved by using a plug-n-play wireless mouse..  My wife is happy to have her pink Android. Thank You!
